data.description: Converts numeric values into Catalan strings
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This is my first contribution to the Catalan Perl community. I'd
    like to see many more Catalan resources anywhere on the net and Perl
    community is a good place to start with.

    Lingua::CA::Numbers seemed to me the obvious choice, as there are
    plenty of Number modules for other well-known languages (I've listed
    some of them above).

    Thanks, /alexm
